channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 23:12 Air alarm to Sinelnikovsky District Surveat for Further Messages.
item.description: 🔴 23:12 Air alarm to Sinelnikovsky District Surveat for Further Messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Pokrovskaya Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivka Territorial Community#Dnepropetrovsk_.
